declarations.comments: An alias for the Either result of decoding
declarations.title: E

declarations.comments:
Read a JSON string to a type `a` while returning a `MultipleErrors` if the
parsing failed.
declarations.title: readJSON

declarations.comments: Read a JSON string to a type `a` using `F a`. Useful with record types.
declarations.title: readJSON'

declarations.comments:
Read a JSON string to a type `a` while returning `Nothing` if the parsing
failed.
declarations.title: readJSON_

declarations.comments: Write a JSON string from a type `a`.
declarations.title: writeJSON

declarations.comments: Read a Foreign value to a type
declarations.title: read

declarations.comments: Read a Foreign value to a type, as a Maybe of type
declarations.title: read_

declarations.comments: A class for reading foreign values to a type
declarations.title: ReadForeign

declarations.comments: A class for reading foreign values from properties
declarations.title: ReadForeignFields

declarations.comments: A class for reading JSON arrays of lenth `n` as nested tuples of size `n`
declarations.title: ReadTuple

declarations.comments: Generic Enum Sum Representations, with constructor names as strings
declarations.title: GenericEnumSumRep

declarations.comments: Generic Tagged Sum Representations, tagged with a "type" field
declarations.title: GenericTaggedSumRep

declarations.comments:
Generic Untagged Product Representations, as a heterogeneous fixed-length array
You should consider using records instead in almost any usage.
declarations.title: GenericUntaggedProductRep

declarations.comments:
Generic Untagged Sum Representations
Note that because the members are untagged, you should verify your members are not the same type
declarations.title: GenericUntaggedSumRep

declarations.comments: Generic Enum Sum Representations, with constructor names as strings
declarations.title: GenericEnumSumRep

declarations.comments: Generic Tagged Sum Representations, tagged with a "type" field
declarations.title: GenericTaggedSumRep

declarations.comments:
Generic Untagged Product Representations, as a heterogeneous fixed-length array
You should consider using records instead in almost any usage.
declarations.title: GenericUntaggedProductRep

declarations.comments:
Generic Untagged Sum Representations
Note that because the members are untagged, you should verify your members are not the same type
declarations.title: GenericUntaggedSumRep
